text: Viktor Hierländer (7 June 1900 – 20 January 1982) was an Austrian football player and manager. ==Career== He played for Floridsdorfer AC, SpVgg Fürth, FK Austria Wien, New York Giants and Wiener AC. He coached Cracovia, BSC Young Boys, Alexandria, Admira Wien, Austria (Amateur, most notably at the 1952 Summer Olympics) and SK Rapid Wien. ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile Austria Wien Archiv *Profile Rapid Wien Archiv Category:1900 births Category:1982 deaths Category:SK Rapid Wien managers Category:Austrian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Players of the Austrian national football team Category:FK Austria Wien players Category:Austrian football forwards Category:Austrian football champions
title: Viktor Hierländer
